history: Lazar Bistro & Cafe was founded in 2020 by two culinary enthusiasts, Chef Kenji Nakamura and Chef Emily Johnson, who shared a passion for blending diverse culinary traditions. Their vision was to create a restaurant where innovative fusion cuisine could thrive, bringing together the best of both worlds.

employees.title: Chef
employees.name: Kenji Nakamura
employees.bio: A master sushi chef with over 20 years of experience, Chef Kenji brings authentic Japanese techniques and a creative flair to our fusion dishes.

employees.title: Chef
employees.name: Emily Johnson
employees.bio: A renowned burger chef, Emily has a knack for combining traditional American flavors with unexpected ingredients, making each dish a delightful surprise.

employees.title: Manager
employees.name: Mark Thompson
employees.bio: With a decade of experience in the hospitality industry, Mark ensures that every guest enjoys exceptional service and a memorable dining experience.
